statements: SELECT * FROM drug_development_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM drug_development_projects WHERE status = 'ongoing';
SELECT project_id, project_name, resources_allocated FROM drug_development_projects ORDER BY resources_allocated DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, lead_scientist FROM drug_development_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS project_count, AVG(resources_allocated) AS avg_resources_allocated FROM drug_development_projects WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM drug_development_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM drug_development_projects WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT lead_scientist, SUM(resources_allocated) AS total_resources FROM drug_development_projects GROUP BY lead_scientist;
SELECT * FROM drug_development_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, status, end_date FROM drug_development_projects WHERE status='Completed' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE resource_type = 'Laboratory';
SELECT project_name, allocated_budget FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects WHERE allocated_budget > 50000 ORDER BY allocated_budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, allocated_budget FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT project_name, resource_name, allocated_amount FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects JOIN ResourceAllocation ON DrugDevelopmentProjects.project_id = ResourceAllocation.project_id ORDER BY allocated_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date, allocated_budget FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects WHERE allocated_budget > 10000;
SELECT r.resource_name, p.project_name FROM ResourceAllocation r INNER JOIN DrugDevelopmentProjects p ON r.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT project_name, ((allocated_budget / DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) * 30) AS monthly_cost FROM DrugDevelopmentProjects;
SELECT * FROM drug_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM drug_projects WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM drug_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT resource_name, quantity, cost FROM resources WHERE cost < 1000;
SELECT project_id, resource_id, allocation_date, quantity_allocated FROM project_resources WHERE quantity_allocated > 10;
SELECT * FROM drug_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM drug_projects WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description, progress FROM drug_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT p.project_name, r.resource_name, pr.quantity_allocated FROM drug_projects p JOIN project_resources pr ON p.project_id = pr.project_id JOIN resources r ON pr.resource_id = r.resource_id WHERE pr.quantity_allocated > 0;

SELECT p.project_name, COUNT(pr.resource_id) AS total_resources FROM drug_projects p LEFT JOIN project_resources pr ON p.project_id = pr.project_id GROUP BY p.project_name HAVING total_resources > 1 ORDER BY total_resources DESC;
SELECT project_name, research_area, drug_name FROM drug_projects;
SELECT team_name, department, lead_researcher FROM research_team;
SELECT resource_type, quantity FROM project_resources;
SELECT project_name, milestone, completion_date FROM drug_projects JOIN research_progress ON drug_projects.project_id = research_progress.project_id;
SELECT * FROM drug_projects WHERE research_area = 'Oncology';
SELECT * FROM drug_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, drug_name FROM drug_projects WHERE research_area = 'Oncology';
SELECT rp.milestone, rp.completion_date, dp.project_name FROM research_progress rp INNER JOIN drug_projects dp ON rp.project_id = dp.project_id WHERE rp.completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT rt.team_name, rt.lead_researcher, pr.resource_type, pr.quantity FROM research_team rt INNER JOIN project_resources pr ON rt.team_id = pr.project_id;
SELECT * FROM drug_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC, drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Drug_Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name FROM Drug_Projects WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT team_name, leader_id FROM Research_Teams JOIN Researchers ON leader_id = researcher_id;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Laboratory Equipment';
SELECT project_name, budget FROM Drug_Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, leader_id FROM Research_Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE LENGTH(researcher_name) > 10;
SELECT project_id, data_type, data_value FROM Experimental_Data WHERE data_type = 'Results' ORDER BY data_value ASC;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Laboratory Equipment' AND quantity > 5;
